document.full_text: wynonna judd grew up in front of her fans as half of the country singing duo the judds. now she and her mother, naomi, are revealing some of their secrets on television in a documentary on oprah winfrey's own network.
document.title: the judds let the secrets fly in tv documentary
lines_and_colors: wynonna judd grew up in front of her fans as half of the country singing duo the judds. now she and her mother, naomi, are revealing some of their secrets on television in a documentary on oprah winfrey's own network.
